Description: We are currently looking for a talented and creative Graphic Designer to join our team for internship. You will collaborate with our design and marketing teams to create visually captivating designs that align with our brand's vision.Key Responsibilities:- Develop engaging designs for both print and digital media, including advertisements, brochures, social media content, and more.- Work closely with the marketing team to conceptualize and execute creative solutions.- Ensure all designs adhere to brand guidelines and effectively communicate the intended message.- Stay updated with design trends and techniques to consistently deliver high-quality work.Skills
Skills:
Proficiency in programs such as Adobe Suite, Photoshop, InDesign, QuarkXPress, and Illustrator
Knowledge of layouts, graphic fundamentals, typography, print, and web
Experience with both print and digital media
A portfolio showcasing your previous graphic design projects.
